Synopsis: 
The crisis and mismanagement have taken their business to the famous designer Barbara Helguera bankrupt. Devoured by frustration, pursued by creditors, his flight forward drives her to withdraw from the world. 

The chance encounter with Andrew makes an anchorite who acts as a "living statue" in a suburban superstore, who invites her to settle with him in his cabin on the campsite "Vista Hermosa", on the outskirts of Madrid. 

In "Vista Hermosa" failed writer living, fairground way, anonymous artists, hairdressers, adventurers, proletarians ... 

Among this range of unexpected life-a world so opposed to yours that makes you reject at once the fascination, Barbara will meet Cristina, which sells cheeses in the supermarket while Fede, her husband does "big business" will know Celeste, who has published books of poetry and won literary prizes, but who now writes for magazines esoteric horoscopes, to Prairial, her husband, playwright of the past, reading the newspaper and chew his anger in silence to MariÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¡ngeles the esthÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â©ticiennes suffering from loneliness and Loredana, his teenage daughter that bitter life, will meet Peter, an affable homeless man who was famous vaudeville singer in the Soviet Union, Salome and Gaudeano, barkers ... 

Barbara will meet all of these multiple and disparate lives whose only common denominator is lack of money, "little lives" that run placid or tormented in caravans and mobile homes, away from the noise and competition citadina. 

But mostly, Barbara know love in a trailer with no toilet, the peculiar love and without morning Andrew, whose main ambition in life do not happen to have much time to read, to think and to put together puzzles.
